definition: Nanshan or Namsan, common place name/Nanshan district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong
south
surname Nan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Nanshan district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong/Nanshan district of Hegang city 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang
Zhongnan Mountains, near Xi'an/also known as the Taiyi Mountains
Live as long as the Zhongnan Mountains! (idiom)/Long may you live!
Nanshan mining district, old name of Dabancheng district 達坂城區|达坂城区[Da2 ban3 cheng2 qu1] of Urumqi city, Xinjiang
old term for Truong Son Ra 長山山脈|长山山脉, mountain range forming the border between Vietnam and Laos and Kampuchea
(bird species of China) Hainan partridge (Arborophila ardens)

sentences.english: Professor Zhong Nanshan devoted himself to the cure of SARS.
sentences.chinese: 鍾南山教授致力於SARS的治療。

sentences.english: The Opening Ceremony of the Universiade is in Nanshan District.
sentences.chinese: 大運會開幕式在南山區。

sentences.english: Just outside Sanya, the newly built Nanshan Temple with its 108-metre-high Buddha statue draws alot of tourists.
sentences.chinese: 緊鄰三亞，有着108米高的南山寺吸引了很多遊客。

sentences.english: Ruthless wild youth in the water, fixed Nanshan day free.
sentences.chinese: 無情野水青春在，不動南山白日閒。

sentences.english: Picking a chrysanthemum, see carefreely South hill.
sentences.chinese: 採菊東籬下，悠然見南山。

sentences.english: Have a Zhong Nashan only, doesn't the society sense awkwardness and danger?
sentences.chinese: 只有一個鐘南山，社會難道不感到尷尬和危險？

sentences.english: One town, Minamisanriku, had about 10,000 people unaccounted for.
sentences.chinese: 南山陸町就有將近10000人下落不明。

sentences.english: The company's headquarters and R&D base are located in Hi-Tech Industrial Park, Nanshan District, Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 公司的總部和研發基地位於深圳市南山區科技園。

sentences.english: Happy birthday, Tom, and many happy returns!
sentences.chinese: 生日快樂，湯姆，並祝你福如東海，壽比南山。

sentences.english: But the politicians never let us finish.
sentences.chinese: 但是，政客們的政策無法讓軍隊馬放南山。

sentences.english: Best of all , there is a small lake near South Hill for us to go fishing.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是，在南山旁有一條小湖，我們可以去釣魚。

sentences.english: How much is the ticket for Nanshan, please?
sentences.chinese: 請問去南山的票多少錢？

sentences.english: The brilliant Big Buddha at Nanshan Mountain helps indicate the magnitude and profundity of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 金碧輝煌的南山大佛展現了中華文明的博大精深。

sentences.english: Nanshan Bamboo Scenic Area is only 18 km away from the Tianmu Lake.
sentences.chinese: 南山竹海景區距天目湖僅18公里。

sentences.english: Here, I wish you longevity elderly family Rudong sea, pine.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我祝願爸爸您老人家福如東海水，壽比南山松。

sentences.english: The Nanshan Mountain is very beautiful.

definition: northern mountain/refers to Mt Mang 邙山 at Luoyang in Henan

green hills/(the good) life
mountain range/mountain ridge
Hongshan district of Chifeng city 赤峰市, Inner Mongolia

Xixiang County in Hanzhong 漢中|汉中[Han4 zhong1], Shaanxi
Futian district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong/Fukuda (Japanese surname)
field for growing happiness/domain for practices leading to enlightenment (Buddhism)
Lianshan district of Huludao city 葫蘆島市|葫芦岛市, Liaoning
Jiangbei district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan/Chongqing's main airport/Jiangbei district of Ningbo city 寧波市|宁波市[Ning2 bo1 shi4], Zhejiang
Nanling mountain, on the border of Hunan, Jiangxi, Guangdong and Guangxi
